about_the_game:
Game plot

You are unemployed and suddenly receive a job offer from the "Clover Research Institute"...

It also comes with a handwritten letter from your "father", who has been missing for 15 order to find out the truth, you embark on this wonderful journey.

In the town, you meet many girls, including a rich girl, a mysterious female chairman, a researcher who loves plants, a female curator of a museum, a princess who is learning cooking, and so on.

Many stories happened between them, filling your life journey.

In this beautiful town, experience a happy sex life together and solve the mystery of your life!

Game elements

[1] Free movement throughout the city, follow the player's operation and wander around;

[2] From growing vegetables to cooking delicacies, a complete cooking system;

[3] Fishing, mining, and growing crops can all be made into specimens to complete the construction of the museum;

[4] Mini-games are interspersed in each story process to entertain players;

[5] Rich dynamic CG animations, every detail is full of dynamics;

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Jennifer

The chairman of Clover Group, who runs Clover Group and is also the financial force behind the entire Clover Town, is the key figure in solving the mystery of her father.

                                                 

Lisa

A biological expert invited by the mayor to help Clover Town build a museum, she is very good at grasping men's psychology and always makes people think about it. 

                                                 

Ashley

A princess of a small country, she came here to learn cooking techniques, with the goal of completing 20 dishes on the kingdom's menu, a cute girl who is a little irritable.

                                                 

Angelina

Your childhood sweetheart, who left because of moving, but fortunately reunited at work, and she always has a good impression of you.

                                                 

Amelie

The director of the research institute who loves plants, small but knowledgeable, a girl who is cold on the outside but warm on the inside.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
